page.title: 03FARMING
page.content: OIL SEED RAPE This crop is new to our area and has doubled in production over the last year. When it is in flower it is a very vivid yellow colour. It is sown in September and harvested in July. The bright yellow flower appears in May and dies down towards time of harvest. It can be harvested in two ways. 1-sprayed wuth chemical to dessicate it. 2-cut into swathes.Left to dry in rows and then combined. It is a high input crop because the sprays and fertilizers are expensive but the farmers are guaranteed a good price at the end of the crop cycle. When the rape is harvested the seed is crushed to make vegetable oil and the residue for cattle feed.The farmer has a contract for the crop from a dealer.
